content:
I think I'll use a note-taking app on my phone to plan my meals and make lists. I've been using it to keep track of my grocery spending, so it'll be easy to add meal planning and lists to it. I can also access it from my computer, so I can plan my meals and make lists at home before I shop online.

Also, I wanted to mention that I got a rewards coupon from Safeway last week for $10 off my next purchase, so I need to make sure to use that before it expires. I've been meaning to try out their online shopping platform, so maybe I'll use the coupon for that.
